backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access control, and approval flows using mixins and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to impacted frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook explaining how to retry deployments and diagnose common build issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that selects between login, admin panel, or user dashboard based on session state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable dashboard tile component with configurable size presets, icons, and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Exports shared Tailwind class constants for consistent dashboard borders, padding, and styling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Configurable confirmation dialog built on shadcn alert dialog components.
Wrapper for Sonner toast notifications providing success, error, and info helpers.
Layout shell with header, footer, and logout confirmation dialog wrapping children.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: Mobile bottom‑sheet overlay component with backdrop, close button, and scroll lock.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Footer containing support and optional settings buttons for dashboard-style views.
Centered mobile-style frame layout container for admin dashboard content.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: Fullscreen modal with backdrop, close button, scroll lock, and scrollable content.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin panel controller managing active view, header, logout, and section rendering.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Fixed bottom navigation bar for switching admin views with icons and labels.
Grid menu of action tiles grouped in rows for navigating to admin sections.
Admin page layout with fixed header, optional back button, scrollable content, and footer.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines AdminView type, nav item interface, and list of admin navigation items.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account totals from storage and displays income, expense, and due KPI cards.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Manages pending user approvals, checks duplicates, updates approved users and accounts, and handles accept/reject actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Allows adding company financial reports and displays taken and due report histories sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Loads worker accounts and displays final balances based on total bill and cost values.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Records shared snack expenses, distributes costs among selected workers, updates account balances, and maintains editable history.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Adds payment or loan entries split among workers, updates account costs, and supports deleting past entries.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Adds production entries, calculates totals per worker, updates account bills, and manages production history with deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper component that renders the system settings section.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Renders a tabbed admin settings UI with sections for branding, labels, notices, admin credentials, and sections management.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Wraps and displays the ApprovalsSection component for handling user request approvals.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Allows adding, deleting, and editing workers and their rate settings persisted in storage.
Manages creating, listing, and deleting work entries while updating worker accounts and stored history.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides a login form using session hooks and branding settings, with optional navigation to registration.
Handles new user registration requests with validation, duplicate checks, and storing pending requests.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Displays support threads and messaging, letting admins view all threads and users view their own; handles sending messages and navigation.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Shows a live-updating digital clock with formatted date and time.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Displays user's KPI totals including due, work, and taken amounts using styled KPI cards.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays a user's snack (nasta) expense history with per-entry details and total calculation.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Shows the user’s loan/payment history filtered from stored records, including per-entry breakdown and total amount.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Displays the user’s production work history with totals for body count and earnings.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Formats worker names, returning provided names or a fallback of 'Unknown worker'.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: React view for editing profile info, uploading profile photos, and changing passwords.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard switching between multiple views like production, work, payments, profile, and support; also loads summary metrics and profile info.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Loads and displays a user's work history with totals for s, d, and money earned.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Computes per‑user and group total amounts for work entries using details or stored rates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Provides branding settings and updates them when storage changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads dashboard override labels and updates them via custom events.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Tracks and updates navigation state using URL hash changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Loads user notice configuration and updates it on storage events.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables, gradients, and UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages branding settings in localStorage with defaults and helper getters for logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminCredential: Stores, loads, and validates admin login credentials using safe storage helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Handles CRUD operations for company financial reports stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Saves, loads, and resets admin-configurable dashboard text overrides in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Stores and retrieves the scrolling notice configuration for the user dashboard.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for reading, writing, and validating localStorage data including arrays.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Ensures migration to the current storage schema by clearing legacy keys and setting a version flag.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Manages support message threads per user, allowing retrieval and message appending.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and maintains stable auto-incremented user IDs for approved users.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Stores, retrieves, and removes user profile photos by username in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Handles session state, login/logout logic, and profile updates with localStorage persistence.
Defines types for session data, login results, profile updates, and user records.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Provides a hook to access the session context with error handling if misused.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling class-based dark mode, custom color palette via CSS variables, extended animations, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a UI/UX fix request with issue notes and multiple feature items related to typography, sizing, colors, and admin panel styling.
